items: Added keyboard shortcuts button with live tooltip showing configured shortcuts
Updated the 'show versions' feature (check your shortcuts!) to open any object versions incl. flows from designed
Removed the manual theme selection, the extension follows your browser preferences
Made searching for sys_id a lot faster most of the time
Added search for object names, sys_properties, tasks, users, ... Use '*' at the end for a 'STARTSWITH' search
Corrected multiple issues when running the extension is an independant windows
Enhanced search: sys_id or object name, now available as a main toolbar button
In Chromium, put tabs inside a group
Light and Dark themes
Background script popup is now using the new UI
Display technical field names now works better
Removed the auto-frame feature because it's implemented by SN now
Corrected a few issues following the manifest version upgrade.
Upgraded manifest to v3. Not a big change from a user point of view but it was such a pain I thought it deserved its own major release.
Not much more, to be honest. Please create issues on github if you see the extension misbehaving.
If you are using extra-service-now.com domains, you may have to re-enable the option, so the extension requests the new, renamed authorization to access all urls.
Finally made some updates required by the recent ServiceNow UI changes.
Updated the documentation search link.
Removed the broadest default permissions for the extension.
important:
You now have to explicitly allow the extension to be used outside of the service-now.com domain. "Enable extra domains for content script" in the options page if you want to use this feature.
Just to be safe, remember you can use the export button in the options page to save your settings into a JSON file. You can import it back later in case of a bug or an issue with sync storage, or to copy your settings accross browsers.
